abstract: Australia’s largest casino company, Crown Ltd., said it agreed to buy Cannery Casino Resorts for $1.75 billion, expanding its business in Las Vegas.
snippet: Australia’s largest casino company, Crown Ltd., said it agreed to buy Cannery Casino Resorts for $1.75 billion, expanding its business in Las Vegas.
lead_paragraph: Australia’s largest casino company, Crown Ltd., said it agreed to buy Cannery Casino Resorts for $1.75 billion, expanding its business in Las Vegas. Cannery Casino, which is privately held, operates three Las Vegas casinos, including the Cannery Casino and Hotel and the Nevada Palace casino, and the Meadows Racetrack and Casino south of Pittsburgh. This month, Publishing and Broadcasting Ltd. split into separate listed companies, Crown and Consolidated Media Holdings Ltd. A private company led by James D. Packer, above, Consolidated Press Holdings Ltd., owns 38 percent of Crown’s stock.

headline.main: Australia: Casino Chain Expands in Las Vegas
headline.print_headline: Casino Chain Expands In Las Vegas

abstract: Time Warner has quietly hired a prominent media analyst as it reshuffles its executive ranks in the weeks before Jeffrey L. Bewkes takes over as chief executive.
snippet: Time Warner has quietly hired a prominent media analyst as it reshuffles its executive ranks in the weeks before Jeffrey L. Bewkes takes over as chief executive.
lead_paragraph: Time Warner has quietly hired a prominent media analyst as it reshuffles its executive ranks in the weeks before Jeffrey L. Bewkes takes over as chief executive from Richard D. Parsons.

headline.main: Media Analyst Takes Post at Time Warner
headline.print_headline: Media Analyst Takes Post at Time Warner

abstract: Time Warner has quietly hired a prominent media analyst as it reshuffles its executive ranks in the weeks before Jeffrey L. Bewkes takes over as chief executive from Richard D. Parsons.
lead_paragraph: Time Warner has quietly hired a prominent media analyst as it reshuffles its executive ranks in the weeks before Jeffrey L. Bewkes takes over as chief executive from Richard D. Parsons.

headline.main: Preparing for Change, Time Warner Hires Media Analyst
